attributes.action: Ban the the use of beagles and other animals in laboratory testing in the uk
attributes.additional_details: As a nation of animal lovers , how can we in this day and age breed dogs,beagles, rabbits, rats and mice solely to be tortured ?? And yet class them as our pets ???? Last year the government approved a new breeding centre for beagles, solely for the purpose of experimentation! Do your own research Google beagle experimentation !!!!! This is a cruel and barbaric practice that has no place in a modern society. So please next time you walk your dog think if you would like him experimented on!
attributes.background: We class ourselves as a nation of animal lovers , The government as recently as last year approved a new breeding centre for beagle dogs solely for animal experimentation. This is an extremely cruel practice that no longer deserves a place in a modern society.
